name: King of the box: The sequel
name_original: King of the box: The sequel
description:
A survival game where you have to survive against waves of enemy tanks with nothing more than a cannon, rocket launcher, and mortar. Our little green tank from the last game is now working for somebody and is being deployed to several locations.

The 3 types of tanks that you'll encounter are just the same as the OG ones, but slightly different: 

  • Brown tank: cannon-fodder,  not much changed except for being slightly weaker.
  • Yellow tank: comes with a yellow laser and nerfed, it maintains its distance.
  • Orange tank: changed the most, it comes with an autocannon instead of two heavy cannons and is no longer heavily armored.

Some other changes from the base game: 

  • You no longer have supply drops, take care of your ammunition because it will run out quickly.
  • The cannon has replaced the autocannon, instead of automatic fire it is now semi-automatic but does more damage
  • The mortar has replaced the railgun, instead of precision it carries a larger splash radius.
  • There are now 5 maps instead of just 1.
  • Exploding tanks now split into many pieces instead of just disappearing (satisfying to watch really).
  • Some more.
